metadata.synopsis: The crazed Fire wizard in the sewers shouts these ADs during combat.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_Ago to -121; 22; 832get into combat with the wizard, and observe the combat ADs.

0.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
0.context: NodeContext: Crazed, defiant - you won't be taken by this new god

1.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
1.text: You won't have me! Not like Sarin! NOT LIKE HER!
1.context: NodeContext: Crazed, defiant - you won't be taken by this new god

2.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
2.context: NodeContext: Crazed, surprised and launching fireballs

3.speaker: Aelis Siryasius
3.text: Burn them burn them BURN THEM TO BE SURE!
3.context: NodeContext: Crazed - the Absolute can control people so you'll burn anyone who comes against you
